players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "That's a lie! I investigated Alice and she's the mafioso. Don't believe her deception."

Bob: "Both of you claim to be the detective, but we know there's only one detective in this game. One of you is definitely lying, and the liar is most likely the mafioso trying to frame the real detective."
You: "I am the real detective. Charlie is lying about investigating me because he is the mafioso. We must vote him out or we lose tonight."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I am the real detective. If you vote me out, town loses tonight. Vote Alice to win."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're truly the detective, why didn't you share your investigation results first? Alice spoke immediately while you only claimed to investigate after being accused."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "That's a lie! I investigated Alice and she's the mafioso. Don't believe her deception."

You: "Both of you claim to be the detective, but we know there's only one detective in this game. One of you is definitely lying, and the liar is most likely the mafioso trying to frame the real detective."
Alice: "I am the real detective. Charlie is lying about investigating me because he is the mafioso. We must vote him out or we lose tonight."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I am the real detective. If you vote me out, town loses tonight. Vote Alice to win."
You: "Charlie, if you're truly the detective, why didn't you share your investigation results first? Alice spoke immediately while you only claimed to investigate after being accused."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
